description: Creates a new configuration for the specified configuration name. Amazon MQ uses the default configuration (the engine type and version).

parameters.name: EngineType
parameters.description: Required. The type of broker engine. Currently, Amazon MQ supports ACTIVEMQ and RABBITMQ.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Required. The name of the configuration. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 1-150 characters long.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Create tags when creating the configuration. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: Required. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationStrategy
nested_items.description: Optional. The authentication strategy associated with the configuration. The default is SIMPLE.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: Required. The date and time of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: Required. The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the configuration.

nested_items.name: LatestRevision
nested_items.description: The latest revision of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: Required. The date and time of the configuration revision.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the configuration revision.

nested_items.name: Revision
nested_items.description: Required. The revision number of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Required. The name of the configuration. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 1-150 characters long.
